title: Face with Open Eyes and Hand Over Mouth
keywords: face with open eyes and hand over mouth
description:
A yellow face with open (non-smiling) eyes and a hand over the mouth, used to convey shock or surprise.

A disambiguation of ðŸ¤­ Face with Hand Over Mouth which appears to have smiling eyes on some platforms, and open/non-smiling eyes on others, creating confusion.

Appearance is similar to ðŸ¥± Yawning Face, though no mouth is visible.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this expressive emoji depicts a face with wide-open, startled eyes and a soft, rounded hand gently covering the mouth. The glossy 3D rendering and subtle gradients on the skin tone evoke a sense of surprise, shock, or perhaps a hushed secret. The slightly upturned eyebrows and the gentle curve of the hand communicate a feeling of mild disbelief or an involuntary gasp, commonly used on Apple devices to express astonishment or a shared, unspoken revelation.
